name: Project Checkmark
description: CHECKMARKS REIMAGINED AND CREATED TO EXPRESS. We believe checkmarks are way more purposeful, meaningful and fun when they are used to enable people express and share their feelings at any point of time with friends, family and the whole world instead of just verifying who they are to the people who already know them. Project checkmark make use of 10 different colors where each represents a range of positive feelings. Using these 10 colors to generate 4 different types of combinations 4 colors, 3 colors, 2 colors & a single color checkmark combinations. Generating 385 unique checkmarks with max supply of 2600 for each unique checkmark, which all can be used to express & share feelings with friends, family and the whole world.
